General.Name: Izhstal PAO
General.Description: Izhstal PAO manufactures and sells specialty steel and stainless long products in Russia. It provides hot-rolled steel and wire rods, ingots, bars and solid profiles, wires, and cold drawn strips. The company's products are used in machine-building, making bearings, rigs, cutting instruments operating at high temperatures and cutting speeds, springs, medical equipment, consumer goods, etc. It serves customers in the automotive, agricultural, power, oil and gas, and construction industries. The company was founded in 1760 and is based in Izhevsk, Russia. Izhstal PAO is a subsidiary of Mechel PAO.
